 Our house is located in the mountain town of Borjomi (famous Georgian resort), close to Bojomi National Park and 11 km from Ski resort -Bakuriani. 
Borjomi is approx. 1 hour 30 minutes away from capital of Georgia - Tbilisi, 
This modern three-story house is 350 square meters  and has a lovely architectural layout only in one story making this option accessible for all people. It has 7  bedrooms and  3 baths, two guest rooms with 3 separate toilet rooms, and a separate outside entrance.
All bedrooms have balconies and in the yard (1400 square meters) around house there is terrace, which help you  enjoy outdoor living and spectacular views
A natural water supply from a nearby spring  provides ‘spring water’ on tap to our house.
And besides , only 30 meters from our house there are located historic  churches  (7-8 century)  and beautiful Forest places.
